metadata.titleEn: HiWATER: 1km/5day compositing vegetation index (NDVI/EVI) product of the Heihe River Basin (2011-2014)
metadata.titleCn: 黑河生态水文遥感试验：黑河流域1km/5天合成植被指数（NDVI/EVI）数据集（2011-2014）
metadata.description: The 1km / 5day vegetation index (NDVI / EVI) data set of Heihe River basin provides a 5-day resolution NDVI / EVI composite product from 2011 to 2014. The data uses the characteristics of FY-3 data, a domestic satellite, with high time resolution (1 day) and spatial resolution (1km), to construct a multi angle observation data set, which is the basis for analyzing multi-source data sets and existing composite vegetation index products and algorithms On the basis of this, an algorithm system of global composite vegetation index production based on multi-source data set is proposed. The vegetation index synthesis algorithm of MODIS is basically adopted, that is, the algorithm system of BRDF angle normalization method, cv-mvc method and MVC method based on the semi empirical walthal model. Using the algorithm system, the composite vegetation index is calculated for the first level data and the second level data, and the quality is identified. Multi-source data sets can provide more angles and more observations than a single sensor in a limited time. However, due to the difference of on orbit running time and performance of sensors, the observation quality of multi-source data sets is uneven. Therefore, in order to make more effective use of multi-source data sets, the algorithm system first classifies the quality of multi-source data sets, which can be divided into primary data, secondary data and tertiary data according to the observation rationality. The third level data are observations polluted by thin clouds and are not used for calculation. In the middle reaches of Heihe River, the verification results of farmland and forest areas show that the NDVI / EVI composite results of combined multi temporal and multi angle observation data are in good agreement with the ground measured data (RMSE = 0.105). Compared with the time series of MODIS mod13a2 product, it fully shows that when the time resolution is increased from 16 days to 5 days, a stable and high-precision vegetation index can describe the details of vegetation growth in detail. In a word, the NDVI / EVI data set of Heihe River Basin, which is 1km / 5day, comprehensively uses multi temporal and multi angle observation data to improve the estimation accuracy and time resolution of parameter products and better serves the application of remote sensing data products.
metadata.descriptionCn: 黑河流域1km/5day植被指数（NDVI/EVI）数据集提供了2011-2014年的5天分辨率NDVI/EVI合成产品，该数据利用我国国产卫星FY-3数据兼具较高时间分辨率（1天）和空间分辨率（1km）的特点构造多角度观测数据集，在对多源数据集以及现有合成植被指数产品及算法进行分析的基础上，提出了基于多源数据集生产1km分辨率5天周期的全球合成植被指数产品算法体系。植被指数合成算法基本采用MODIS的植被指数合成算法，即基于半经验的Walthall模型的BRDF角度归一化方法、CV-MVC法和MVC法的算法体系。利用该算法体系，分别对一级数据、二级数据计算合成植被指数，并进行质量标识。多源数据集可在有限时间内提供比单一传感器更多的角度和更多次的观测，但是，由于传感器的在轨运行时间及性能差异，多源数据集的观测质量参差不齐。因此，为更有效的利用多源数据集，算法体系首先对多源数据集进行了质量分级，根据观测合理性分为一级数据、二级数据、三级数据。三级数据为受薄云污染的观测，不用于计算。在黑河中游农田、森林区域的验证结果表明，联合多时相、多角度观测数据的NDVI/EVI合成结果与地面实测数据具有较好的一致性（RMSE=0.105）。与MODIS MOD13A2产品的时间序列对比分析，充分显示了时间分辨率从16天提高到5天时，稳定的高精度的植被指数对植被生长细节的细致描述。总之，黑河流域1km/5day合成植被指数（NDVI/EVI）数据集综合利用多时相、多角度观测数据以提高参数产品的估算精度、时间分辨率等，更好的服务于遥感数据产品的应用。

background: Upscaling of eco-hydrological processes on a heterogeneous surface is a grand challenge. Progress in this field is hindered by the poor availability of multiscale observations. HiWATER is an experiment designed to address this challenge through instrumentation on hierarchically nested scales to obtain multiscale and multidisciplinary data.
challenges: Progress in this field is hindered by the poor availability of multiscale observations.
methods: Several intensive observation periods (IOPs) and continuous hydrometeorological observations were carried out during HiWATER. Only data collected during the IOP in 2012 are presented in this paper. Instruments for the oasis-desert system were arranged in hierarchically nested scales to capture multi-scale eco-hydrological processes. We established a sparse network to investigate the oasis-desert interaction. One superstation was constructed within the oasis, and four EC towers and four two-layer automatic meteorological stations (AMSs) were installed in different landscapes surrounding the oasis, including sandy desert, desert pavement, desert steppe, and wetland. Intensive observations were implemented at the irrigation district scale. A total of 12 airborne remote sensing missions were conducted to cover the FEA using LiDAR, an imaging spectrometer, a multi-angle thermal imager, and an L-band microwave radiometer.
dataset: We introduce a multiscale dataset obtained from Heihe Watershed Allied Telemetry Experimental Research (HiWATER) in an oasis-desert area in 2012. The HiWATER observation system consists of a flux observation matrix of eddy covariance towers, large aperture scintillometers, and automatic meteorological stations; an eco-hydrological sensor network of soil moisture and leaf area index; hyper-resolution airborne remote sensing using LiDAR, imaging spectrometer, multi-angle thermal imager, and L-band microwave radiometer; and synchronical ground measurements of vegetation dynamics and photosynthesis processes. All observational data were carefully quality controlled throughout sensor calibration, data collection, data processing, and datasets generation. The data are freely available at figshare and the Cold and Arid Regions Science Data Centre.
backgroundCn: 生态水文过程在异质表面上的上升尺度是一个重大挑战。该领域的进展受到多尺度观测数据稀缺的制约。HiWATER实验旨在通过在分层嵌套尺度上进行仪器布置，以获取多尺度和多学科的数据，从而应对这一挑战。
challengesCn: 该领域的进展受到多尺度观测稀缺的阻碍。
methodsCn: 在HiWATER期间进行了几次强烈观测期（IOPs）和连续的水文气象观测。本文仅展示了2012年IOP期间收集的数据。为了捕捉多尺度生态水文过程，绿洲-沙漠系统的仪器按照层次嵌套的尺度进行布置。我们建立了一个稀疏网络，以研究绿洲-沙漠的相互作用。在绿洲内建造了一个超级站，并在绿洲周围不同的景观中安装了四个涡度协方差（EC）塔和四个双层自动气象站（AMS），这些景观包括沙漠、沙漠铺装、沙漠草原和湿地。在灌溉区尺度上实施了强烈观测。共进行了12次空中遥感任务，使用了激光雷达、成像光谱仪、多角度热成像仪和L波段微波辐射计覆盖了FEA。
datasetCn: 我们介绍了一个多尺度数据集，该数据集来自2012年在绿洲-沙漠地区进行的黑河流域联合遥测实验研究（HiWATER）。HiWATER观测系统由涡度协方差塔、大孔径闪烁仪和自动气象站组成的通量观测矩阵；土壤湿度和叶面积指数的生态水文传感器网络；使用激光雷达、成像光谱仪、多角度热成像仪和L波段微波辐射计的超高分辨率航空遥感；以及同步的植被动态和光合作用过程的地面测量。所有观测数据在传感器校准、数据收集、数据处理和数据集生成过程中都经过了严格的质量控制。这些数据可在figshare和寒区与干旱区科学数据中心免费获取。

Example.QuestionEn: Can you provide an example of how multiscale observations are utilized to study eco-hydrological processes in an oasis-desert system?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个示例，说明如何利用多尺度观测来研究绿洲-沙漠系统中的生态水文过程？
Example.AnswerEn: In the HiWATER experiment, multiscale observations were utilized through a hierarchically nested arrangement of instruments to capture multi-scale eco-hydrological processes. These included a sparse network for oasis-desert interaction, a superstation within the oasis, and multiple EC towers and automatic meteorological stations in various surrounding landscapes. Additionally, intensive observations at the irrigation district scale and airborne remote sensing missions were conducted.
Example.AnswerCn: 在HiWATER实验中，通过层次嵌套的仪器安排利用多尺度观测来捕捉多尺度生态水文过程。这些观测包括用于绿洲-沙漠相互作用的稀疏网络、绿洲内的超级站，以及在周围不同景观中设置的多个涡度塔和自动气象站。此外，还在灌溉区尺度进行了密集观测，并进行了空中遥感任务。

Definition.QuestionEn: What is the meaning of 'multiscale observation' in the context of eco-hydrological research?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在生态水文学研究的背景下，“多尺度观测”的含义是什么？
Definition.AnswerEn: In the context of eco-hydrological research, 'multiscale observation' refers to the collection of data at various spatial and temporal scales to capture complex processes occurring at different levels. This approach involves using instruments arranged in hierarchically nested scales, such as flux observation matrices, eco-hydrological sensor networks, and remote sensing technologies, to obtain comprehensive datasets that reflect the interactions within ecosystems.
Definition.AnswerCn: 在生态水文研究的背景下，“多尺度观测”是指在不同的空间和时间尺度上收集数据，以捕捉在不同层次上发生的复杂过程。这种方法涉及使用按层次嵌套的尺度排列的仪器，如通量观测矩阵、生态水文传感器网络和遥感技术，以获取反映生态系统内部相互作用的综合数据集。

Definition.QuestionEn: How is 'quality control' defined in the context of data collection for eco-hydrological research?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在生态水文学研究的数据收集过程中，“质量控制”是如何定义的？
Definition.AnswerEn: In eco-hydrological research, 'quality control' refers to the procedures implemented to ensure the accuracy and reliability of collected data. This involves careful calibration of sensors, systematic data collection, meticulous data processing, and the generation of datasets that are free from errors. Quality control measures are essential for maintaining the integrity of the data used in research and for making it available for public use.
Definition.AnswerCn: 在生态水文研究中，“质量控制”指的是为确保收集数据的准确性和可靠性而实施的程序。这涉及传感器的仔细校准、系统的数据收集、细致的数据处理，以及生成无错误的数据集。质量控制措施对于维护研究中使用的数据的完整性以及使其可供公众使用至关重要。

Definition.QuestionEn: What does 'BRDF angle normalization' mean in the context of vegetation index synthesis algorithms?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在植被指数合成算法的背景下，“BRDF角度归一化”是什么意思？
Definition.AnswerEn: In the context of vegetation index synthesis algorithms, 'BRDF angle normalization' refers to a method used to standardize the effects of different viewing angles on the reflectance values obtained from remote sensing data. This technique, based on the Bidirectional Reflectance Distribution Function (BRDF), helps in minimizing variations caused by the geometry of observation, thereby enabling more accurate synthesis of vegetation indices like NDVI and EVI.
Definition.AnswerCn: 在植被指数合成算法的背景下，“BRDF角度归一化”指的是一种标准化遥感数据中不同观测角度对反射值影响的方法。该技术基于双向反射分布函数（BRDF），有助于最小化由于观测几何造成的变化，从而使得植被指数如NDVI和EVI的合成更加准确。

Comparison.QuestionEn: How do the data collection methods utilized in the HiWATER experiment compare to those used in the generation of the 1km/5-day vegetation index dataset in terms of capturing eco-hydrological processes?
Comparison.QuestionCn: HiWATER实验中使用的数据收集方法与生成1km/5天植被指数数据集的方法在捕捉生态水文过程方面有何比较？
Comparison.AnswerEn: The HiWATER experiment employs a hierarchical scale approach with a combination of intensive observation periods, a sparse network, superstations, EC towers, and airborne remote sensing to capture multiscale eco-hydrological processes. In contrast, the 1km/5-day vegetation index dataset focuses primarily on multi-angle satellite observations. HiWATER's approach is more comprehensive in terms of spatial heterogeneity and process understanding.
Comparison.AnswerCn: HiWATER实验采用分层尺度的方法，结合了密集观测期、稀疏网络、超级站、生态系统塔和航空遥感，以捕捉多尺度生态水文过程。相比之下，1km/5天的植被指数数据集主要集中于多角度卫星观测。HiWATER的方法在空间异质性和过程理解方面更为全面。

Comparison.QuestionEn: What are the differences in data quality control measures between the multiscale dataset obtained from HiWATER and the 1km/5-day vegetation index dataset?
Comparison.QuestionCn: HiWATER获得的多尺度数据集与1km/5天植被指数数据集之间的数据质量控制措施有什么区别？
Comparison.AnswerEn: The multiscale dataset from HiWATER involves careful quality control through sensor calibration, data collection, processing, and dataset generation, ensuring reliability across various instruments and scales. The 1km/5-day vegetation index dataset utilizes a quality grading system for multi-source data to manage the variability in observation quality due to sensor differences, ensuring effective use of reliable data.
Comparison.AnswerCn: HiWATER的多尺度数据集通过传感器校准、数据收集、处理和数据集生成进行仔细的质量控制，确保在各种仪器和尺度上的可靠性。1km/5天的植被指数数据集利用多源数据的质量评分系统来管理由于传感器差异导致的观测质量变异，确保有效使用可靠数据。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: How do the hierarchical scales of instrumentation in a multiscale observation system contribute to understanding eco-hydrological processes in heterogeneous landscapes?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 多尺度观测系统中仪器的层级尺度如何有助于理解异质景观中的生态水文过程？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The hierarchical scales of instrumentation allow for the capture of multiscale eco-hydrological processes by arranging instruments like eddy covariance towers and automatic meteorological stations in different landscapes. This setup enables detailed observation of interactions, such as those between oasis and desert systems, and provides a comprehensive view of eco-hydrological dynamics across various scales.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 层次化的仪器规模允许通过在不同景观中布置仪器，如涡度协方差塔和自动气象站，捕捉多尺度的生态水文过程。这种设置能够详细观察诸如绿洲与沙漠系统之间的相互作用，并提供跨越不同尺度的生态水文动态的全面视角。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: How might an increase in the temporal resolution of vegetation index datasets enhance the understanding of vegetation growth details?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 提高植被指数数据集的时间分辨率如何增强对植被生长细节的理解？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: An increase in temporal resolution, such as from 16 days to 5 days, allows for more detailed monitoring of vegetation growth processes. This enhanced resolution provides more frequent observations, which can lead to a better understanding of the subtle changes and dynamics in vegetation growth over time, capturing details that might be missed with coarser temporal data.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 提高时间分辨率，例如从16天提高到5天，可以更详细地监测植被生长过程。这种增强的分辨率提供了更频繁的观测，有助于更好地理解植被生长过程中的微妙变化和动态，捕捉到在较粗时间数据中可能被忽略的细节。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What causes the variability in observation quality when using multi-source datasets for eco-hydrological research in heterogeneous surfaces?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在使用多源数据集进行异质表面生态水文研究时，观察质量的变异性原因是什么？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The variability in observation quality can be attributed to differences in the in-orbit operation time and performance of different sensors. This can result in inconsistent quality across observations, necessitating a graded quality classification system to effectively utilize multi-source datasets.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 观测质量的变异性可以归因于不同传感器在轨道操作时间和性能的差异。这可能导致观测质量的不一致，因此需要一个分级质量分类系统，以有效利用多源数据集。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: Why is it challenging to upscale eco-hydrological processes on heterogeneous surfaces?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 为什么在异质表面上提升生态水文过程的规模是具有挑战性的？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Upscaling eco-hydrological processes on heterogeneous surfaces is challenging due to the poor availability of multiscale observations. This limitation hinders progress in understanding these processes across different scales.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 在异质表面上提升生态水文过程的研究面临挑战，主要是由于多尺度观测的可用性较差。这一限制阻碍了我们在不同尺度上理解这些过程的进展。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What factors contribute to the successful integration of multi-source and multi-scale data in observing eco-hydrological processes?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 成功整合多源和多尺度数据以观察生态水文过程的因素包括哪些？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The successful integration of multi-source and multi-scale data is facilitated by the use of a hierarchically nested scale instrumentation approach, which captures eco-hydrological processes at multiple scales. This includes a sparse network of superstations, EC towers, and automatic meteorological stations, as well as hyper-resolution airborne remote sensing and synchronical ground measurements, ensuring comprehensive data collection and quality control.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 多源多尺度数据的成功整合得益于分层嵌套的尺度仪器方法，该方法能够在多个尺度上捕捉生态水文过程。这包括稀疏的超级站网络、生态系统（EC）塔和自动气象站，以及超高分辨率的航空遥感和同步地面测量，确保了全面的数据收集和质量控制。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the potential consequences of using multiscale and multidisciplinary data collection methods for understanding eco-hydrological processes in heterogeneous surfaces?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 使用多尺度和多学科数据收集方法来理解异质表面的生态水文过程的潜在后果是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: The use of multiscale and multidisciplinary data collection methods, as demonstrated by the HiWATER experiment, allows for a more comprehensive understanding of eco-hydrological processes by capturing data across various scales and disciplines. This approach addresses the challenge of poor availability of multiscale observations, providing insights into the interactions between different landscape features and improving the accuracy of eco-hydrological models.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: HiWATER实验所展示的多尺度和多学科数据收集方法，使我们能够更全面地理解生态水文过程，通过在不同尺度和学科上捕获数据。这种方法解决了多尺度观测稀缺的挑战，提供了对不同景观特征之间相互作用的洞察，并提高了生态水文模型的准确性。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: How does the integration of multi-source datasets impact the accuracy and detail of vegetation index products used for remote sensing applications?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 多源数据集的集成如何影响用于遥感应用的植被指数产品的准确性和细节？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Integrating multi-source datasets enhances the accuracy and detail of vegetation index products by combining data from different angles and times, which improves parameter estimation accuracy and time resolution. This integration, as seen in the development of the 1km/5day NDVI/EVI dataset, results in a more precise depiction of vegetation growth details, surpassing single-source datasets like MODIS in temporal resolution and stability.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 整合多源数据集通过结合不同角度和时间的数据，提高了植被指数产品的准确性和细节，这改善了参数估计的准确性和时间分辨率。这种整合在1km/5天NDVI/EVI数据集的开发中得到了体现，结果是对植被生长细节的更精确描绘，超越了像MODIS这样的单源数据集在时间分辨率和稳定性方面的表现。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: Why is it important to synthesize multiscale and multidisciplinary data for understanding eco-hydrological processes in heterogeneous surfaces?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 合成多尺度和多学科数据对于理解异质表面的生态水文过程的重要性是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The goal is to address the challenge of upscaling eco-hydrological processes, which is hindered by the poor availability of multiscale observations. By synthesizing multiscale and multidisciplinary data, researchers aim to capture the complex interactions in heterogeneous surfaces, improving our understanding and facilitating more accurate modeling.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 目标是解决生态水文过程的上升挑战，这受到多尺度观测数据稀缺的阻碍。通过综合多尺度和多学科的数据，研究人员旨在捕捉异质表面中的复杂相互作用，从而提高我们的理解并促进更准确的建模。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What is the purpose behind using multi-angle observation data in developing a vegetation index synthesis algorithm?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 使用多角度观测数据开发植被指数合成算法的目的是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The purpose is to improve the accuracy and temporal resolution of vegetation index products by leveraging the multiple perspectives provided by multi-angle observation data. This approach enhances the description of vegetation growth details and ensures a higher precision in parameter estimation, ultimately serving remote sensing applications better.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 该目的在于通过利用多角度观测数据提供的多重视角，提高植被指数产品的准确性和时间分辨率。这种方法增强了对植被生长细节的描述，并确保了参数估计的更高精度，最终更好地服务于遥感应用。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What instrumental setup is required to capture multi-scale eco-hydrological processes in a heterogeneous landscape, and how is such an arrangement implemented effectively?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 捕捉异质景观中的多尺度生态水文过程所需的仪器设置是什么，以及如何有效实施这样的安排？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: Instruments for capturing multi-scale eco-hydrological processes are arranged in hierarchically nested scales. This involves constructing a superstation within the oasis, and installing four eddy covariance (EC) towers and four two-layer automatic meteorological stations (AMSs) in different landscapes such as sandy desert, desert pavement, desert steppe, and wetland.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 捕捉多尺度生态水文过程的仪器按层次嵌套的尺度进行排列。这涉及在绿洲内构建一个超级站，并在不同的景观中安装四个涡度协方差（EC）塔和四个双层自动气象站（AMS），这些景观包括沙漠、沙砾地、荒漠草原和湿地。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: How can multi-angle remote sensing data be synthesized into high-resolution NDVI/EVI products, and what are the key steps involved in ensuring data quality?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 如何将多角度遥感数据合成高分辨率的NDVI/EVI产品，并确保数据质量的关键步骤有哪些？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The synthesis of multi-angle remote sensing data into high-resolution NDVI/EVI products involves using a multi-source dataset to construct a multi-angle observation dataset. The key steps include employing a MODIS-based vegetation index synthesis algorithm, which utilizes BRDF angle normalization methods and CV-MVC and MVC algorithms to compute composite vegetation indices. Data quality is ensured through careful quality grading and classification of datasets based on observation reasonableness.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 多角度遥感数据合成高分辨率NDVI/EVI产品的过程涉及使用多源数据集构建多角度观测数据集。关键步骤包括采用基于MODIS的植被指数合成算法，该算法利用BRDF角度归一化方法以及CV-MVC和MVC算法来计算复合植被指数。通过对数据集进行仔细的质量分级和基于观测合理性的分类，确保数据质量。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What instrumentation advancements enable the collection of multiscale and multidisciplinary data in eco-hydrological research?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些仪器进展使得在生态水文学研究中能够收集多尺度和多学科的数据？
Enablement.AnswerEn: HiWATER uses instrumentation on hierarchically nested scales, including a flux observation matrix of eddy covariance towers, large aperture scintillometers, automatic meteorological stations, and hyper-resolution airborne remote sensing using LiDAR, an imaging spectrometer, multi-angle thermal imager, and L-band microwave radiometer.
Enablement.AnswerCn: HiWATER使用分层嵌套尺度的仪器，包括涡度协方差塔的通量观测矩阵、大孔径闪烁仪、自动气象站，以及使用激光雷达、成像光谱仪、多角度热成像仪和L波段微波辐射计的超高分辨率航空遥感。

Enablement.QuestionEn: How does the use of multi-angle and multi-temporal remote sensing data enable the synthesis of high-resolution vegetation indices?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 多角度和多时相遥感数据的使用如何实现高分辨率植被指数的合成？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The synthesis of vegetation indices such as NDVI/EVI involves using multi-angle and multi-temporal remote sensing data from satellites like FY-3, which allows for higher temporal resolution and incorporates multiple observations to improve accuracy and detail of vegetation growth descriptions.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 植被指数的合成，如NDVI/EVI，涉及使用来自FY-3等卫星的多角度和多时相遥感数据，这允许更高的时间分辨率，并结合多次观测以提高植被生长描述的准确性和细节。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might there be difficulties in obtaining high-quality multiscale observations for eco-hydrological processes in heterogeneous surfaces?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 在异质表面上获取高质量的多尺度生态水文过程观测可能会面临哪些困难？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Progress in the field is hindered by the poor availability of multiscale observations, which is a grand challenge in upscaling eco-hydrological processes on heterogeneous surfaces.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 该领域的进展受到多尺度观测稀缺的制约，这是在异质表面上提升生态水文过程的重大挑战。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why could the improvement in temporal resolution from 16 days to 5 days lead to more detailed descriptions of vegetation growth dynamics?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 从16天的时间分辨率提高到5天的时间分辨率，为什么会导致对植被生长动态的更详细描述？
Expectation.AnswerEn: The 5-day temporal resolution provides stable high-precision vegetation index data, which better describes the details of vegetation growth dynamics compared to a 16-day resolution.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 5天的时间分辨率提供了稳定的高精度植被指数数据，相比于16天的分辨率，更好地描述了植被生长动态的细节。

Expectation.QuestionEn: What might be the expected challenges when utilizing multi-source datasets for synthesizing vegetation indices, and how could these challenges be addressed?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 在利用多源数据集合成植被指数时可能遇到的挑战是什么，以及如何解决这些挑战？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Challenges arise due to the varying quality of observations from different sensors in multi-source datasets. To address these challenges, the algorithm system first grades the quality of the multi-source data, classifying them into primary, secondary, and tertiary data based on observation rationality.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 由于来自不同传感器的多源数据观察质量差异，挑战随之而来。为了解决这些挑战，算法系统首先对多源数据的质量进行评分，根据观察的合理性将其分类为主要数据、次要数据和三级数据。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: How would you evaluate the effectiveness of using multi-source data in improving the temporal resolution of vegetation index products?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 如何评估使用多源数据在提高植被指数产品时间分辨率方面的有效性？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: The use of multi-source data effectively improves the temporal resolution of vegetation index products by providing more observation angles and frequencies within limited timeframes, leading to a more detailed depiction of vegetation growth dynamics. The combination of high temporal and spatial resolution data, such as those from China's FY-3 satellites, enhances the estimation accuracy of these products over a 5-day period.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 多源数据的使用有效提高了植被指数产品的时间分辨率，通过在有限的时间框架内提供更多的观测角度和频率，从而更详细地描绘了植被生长动态。结合高时间和空间分辨率的数据，例如来自中国FY-3卫星的数据，增强了这些产品在5天内的估计准确性。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I can't understand how multi-source datasets can be effectively utilized when there are differences in sensor performance and observation quality.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我无法理解如何有效利用多源数据集，因为传感器性能和观测质量存在差异。
Assertion.AnswerEn: To effectively utilize multi-source datasets, an algorithm system is implemented that first grades the quality of the datasets. The data is classified into primary, secondary, and tertiary levels based on observation rationality, with tertiary data being excluded from calculations due to pollution by thin clouds. This quality grading facilitates more effective use of multi-source datasets despite differences in sensor performance and observation quality.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 为了有效利用多源数据集，实施了一种算法系统，首先对数据集的质量进行评分。根据观测合理性，数据被分为初级、次级和三级，三级数据由于受到薄云的污染而被排除在计算之外。这种质量评分有助于更有效地使用多源数据集，尽管传感器性能和观测质量存在差异。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I don't see how the combination of multi-angle and multi-temporal observation data offers a detailed description of vegetation growth processes.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我看不出多角度和多时相观测数据的结合如何能提供对植被生长过程的详细描述。
Assertion.AnswerEn: The combination of multi-angle and multi-temporal observation data allows for a stable and high-precision vegetation index that captures detailed vegetation growth processes. By improving the time resolution from 16 days to 5 days, the dataset provides a more detailed temporal resolution of vegetation dynamics, thus offering a finer description of the growth processes.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 多角度和多时相观测数据的结合使得能够获得稳定且高精度的植被指数，从而捕捉到详细的植被生长过程。通过将时间分辨率从16天提高到5天，该数据集提供了更详细的植被动态时间分辨率，从而对生长过程提供了更细致的描述。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I'm not sure how the lack of multiscale observations poses a challenge in upscaling eco-hydrological processes on heterogeneous surfaces.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不确定缺乏多尺度观测如何对异质表面的生态水文过程的上尺度化构成挑战。
Assertion.AnswerEn: The lack of multiscale observations poses a challenge because it hinders the ability to capture the complexity of eco-hydrological processes across different scales. The HiWATER experiment addresses this by using a hierarchically nested scale instrumentation approach to gather multiscale and multidisciplinary data, thus enabling the study of eco-hydrological processes on heterogeneous surfaces more effectively.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 缺乏多尺度观测带来了挑战，因为这妨碍了捕捉不同尺度上生态水文过程的复杂性。HiWATER实验通过采用分层嵌套的尺度仪器方法来收集多尺度和多学科的数据，从而更有效地研究异质表面上的生态水文过程。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please identify the challenges in utilizing multi-source datasets for high temporal and spatial resolution in vegetation index synthesis.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 识别在利用多源数据集进行高时间和空间分辨率植被指数合成时面临的挑战。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: The challenges in utilizing multi-source datasets include the variability in observation quality due to differences in sensor performance and operational timelines. The data quality is inconsistent, necessitating a quality grading system for the datasets, which categorizes them into primary, secondary, and tertiary data based on observation soundness. Tertiary data are typically affected by thin cloud contamination and are excluded from calculations. The synthesis algorithm must effectively manage these quality variations to ensure reliable high-resolution vegetation index outputs.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 利用多源数据集的挑战包括由于传感器性能和操作时间线的差异导致的观测质量变异。数据质量不一致，因此需要一个质量评分系统，将数据集分为主要、次要和三级数据，基于观测的可靠性进行分类。三级数据通常受到薄云污染的影响，因此在计算中被排除。合成算法必须有效管理这些质量变异，以确保可靠的高分辨率植被指数输出。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please discuss the methodologies to ensure the accuracy and consistency of synthesized vegetation indices from multi-angle and multi-temporal observations.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请讨论确保从多角度和多时相观测中合成的植被指数的准确性和一致性的方法论。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: To ensure accuracy and consistency of synthesized vegetation indices, methodologies involve using a synthesis algorithm based on the MODIS vegetation index synthesis approach, which includes semi-empirical BRDF angle normalization methods like the Walthall model, and algorithms such as CV-MVC and MVC. These methods help in calculating and quality marking the synthesized indices for various data levels. The approach leverages the advantages of multi-angle and multi-temporal observations to enhance the precision and temporal resolution of the vegetation index products.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 为了确保合成植被指数的准确性和一致性，方法论涉及使用基于MODIS植被指数合成方法的合成算法，包括半经验的BRDF角度归一化方法，如Walthall模型，以及CV-MVC和MVC等算法。这些方法有助于计算和质量标记不同数据级别的合成指数。该方法利用多角度和多时相观测的优势，以提高植被指数产品的精度和时间分辨率。
